feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update outdated rollup deps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15151
  • Fix string-templates on dev by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15159
  • Bump path-to-regexp from 0.1.11 to 0.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15135
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15167
  • Custom role in groups issue by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15166
  • Fix for fetching schemas in Postgres 9.5 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.27...3.2.28

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix client error SVG by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15161
  • Automation Branching UX updates by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15001
  • API typing fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15171
  • Relationship searching on tables with spaces by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15172
  • Prevent syncing row changes between users for views filtered by current user by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15163
  • API typing fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15182
  • Updating pro to latest (small API change). by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.28...3.2.29

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove stopped containers by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15191
  • Convert frontend-core API client to Typescript by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15096
  • Convert portal admin store to typescript by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15170
  • Convert portal apps store to typescript by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15174
  • Convert portal audit logs store to typescript by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15178
  • Convert portal auth store to typescript by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15181
  • Automation webhook binding fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15184
  • UI - always ask for password with encrypted app exports by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15195
  • Reject plugins when importing apps by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15196
  • Datasource fetch schema fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15197
  • Typing datasource and sorted integration stores by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15198
  • Remove automations survey by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15194
  • Fix searching relationships by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15206
  • Allow views and tables with whitespaces by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15204
  • Build builder in dev mode while on dev by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15203
  • Fix patching rows from views with hidden relationships by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15201
  • Update DS and integration store to BudiStore by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15200
  • Fix onboarding users by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15212
  • Fix datasource validity checking by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15213
  • Bump next from 14.2.10 to 14.2.15 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15207
  • Guard display column in the api by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15209
  • Update pro submodule by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15219
  • allow users to select firestore databases other than the default by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15221
  • Typing the table store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15220
  • Typing viewV2 store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15224
  • Typing grid columns store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15228
  • Typing grid datasources store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15229
  • Configure frontend-core by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15235
  • Typing automation store by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15227
  • Typing grid datasources stores by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15236
  • Fix wrong datasource typing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15261
  • Fix svelte warnings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15256
  • Typing grid validation stores by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15238
  • Builder store typescript conversions by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15262
  • Typing grid users stores by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15239
  • Typing grid menu store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15240
  • fix, handling use case when duplicate step name is allowed by @imnaveenk in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15234
  • Update builder aliases by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15205
  • Typing grid UI store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15249
  • Typing grid clipboard store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15250
  • Typing grid scroll store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15251
  • Typing grid rows stores by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15255
  • Typing grid reorder store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15271
  • Typing grid resize store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15272
  • Typing grid config store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15264
  • Typing grid conditions store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15265
  • Typing remaining grid stores by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15266
  • Respect grid config in builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15273
  • Component, Integrations and componentTreeNode stores converted to typescript by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15267
  • Plugin author enhancements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15268
  • Ignore default values for view sort by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15278
  • Automation test details fix by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.29...3.2.30

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.32
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix user search by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15284

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.31...3.2.32
